ShepherdsCrookAffectedEntitiesDesc: The entities affected by the Shepherd's Crook. Tested by checking whether one of the configured values is part of the entity code.
ShepherdsCrookAngerDurabilityCostDesc: The durability cost of the anger mode.
ShepherdsCrookAngerMinGenDesc: The generation required to use anger mode.
ShepherdsCrookScareDurabilityCostDesc: The durability cost of the scare mode.
ShepherdsCrookScareMinGenDesc: The generation required to use scare mode.
ShepherdsCrookCalmDurabilityCostDesc: The durability cost of the calm mode.
ShepherdsCrookCalmMinGenDesc: The generation required to use calm mode.
ShepherdsCrookParticlesDesc: Whether or not to spawn particles on use.
